title: Unable to Login to the client
body: Hey I am having issues logging in to the client. I am able to open the legacy and the new client but at the login screen it gives me the Connection error popup that says I'm unable to reach the PvP server. I am curious what kinds of things I can do in order to fix my issue? I have a working internet that should be able to support the game and I don't see anything wrong on the side of League. I also tried redownloading the game and it did not fix the issue. I am also on Mac if that helps. PLZ HELP RITO

replies.body: It sounds like you're having issues specifically reaching our authentication servers, though your net might be working fine elsewhere.  Try the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help with figuring this out.  Let me know if you have any questions!
I could email you my logs from the hextech tech helper thing but for some reason I'm having trouble just attaching said files to a message on here

Thanks for your follow up!  Unfortunately, that info doesn't tell me a whole lot but your logs from the HRT could!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead and we'll help you individually through there.  The ticketing center will allow you to attach files so we can take a closer look.  We'll get back to you!
AM I JUST STUPID SMH this is too complicated

Could you tell me if its an issue with my wifi? I am not very tech savvy but i know my firewall isn't blocking it or anything like that. Heres my results from Terminal for Wifi data, anything peculiar?

 Wi-Fi:
          Type: IEEE80211
          BSD Device Name: en0
          Hardware (MAC) Address: 2c:f0:ee:0d:ab:ee
          IPv4:
              Configuration Method: DHCP
          IPv6:
              Configuration Method: Automatic
          DNS:
              Server Addresses: 208.67.222.222, 208.67.220.220
          Proxies:
              Exceptions List: *.local, 169.254/16
              FTP Passive Mode: Yes
          IEEE80211:
              JoinModeFallback: DoNothing
              PowerEnabled: 1
              RememberJoinedNetworks: 1
              Version: 2200
